DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Two Formulations Carisoprodol Subjects With Musculoskeletal Spasm Lower Back
DOC.detailed_description: Methodology : This randomize , double-blind , double-dummy , placebo-controlled , parallel-group study subject 18-70 year age acute , painful , muscle spasm low back . The study consist baseline screen ( Study Day 1 ) , subject evaluate inclusion/exclusion criterion , 7-day double-blind treatment period ( Study Day 1 Study Day 7 ) . Subjects randomly assign dosed twice daily one follow double-blind treatment : SR carisoprodol 500-mg tablet , SR carisoprodol 700-mg tablet , placebo . Subjects evaluate clinic Study Days 1 , 3 7 . Subjects remain symptomatic Study Day 7 allow continue study 7-day , double-blind extension period discretion Investigator . Subjects contact telephone safety follow-up 7 day last dose study medication . A pharmacokinetic ( PK ) substudy conduct select site . These site obtain blood sample PK analysis end 7-day treatment period 14-day treatment period , applicable .
